attributes.action: Limit the amount Premiership footballers are paid per week and ask the football clubs to donate the amount they will save on wages to charity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Footballers get paid stupid amounts of money to kick a ball around a field.  Half of the time they do this they do it badly.  The huge increase in clubs ability to pay these massive weekly pay packets has caused some players, Ashley Cole, to be disgusted to be only offered £55k per week.  How petty, how greedy and selfish and how unnecessary.  There was a time where managers got paid more than their players, not now.  In which other profession is that the case? None.  Wages must and should be limited and the money put to better use, millions could be donated to charity each WEEK if something was done.
Sign!!! Make a difference and stop greedy footballers getting more than they deserve for doing less than they should.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
